channel.title: Shamon Scape Client v2
channel.description:
[CENTER]This is my best client I have ever made so far. [B] The Making:[/B] I start out a long while back with MITB 317 renamed client I knew little to slim about renamed clients, plus with not alot of tuts out their it pushed me to learn. I started out with this client by trying to add sprites, which i soon found out how to do. I can change any sprite on the client I wish. Next I went for the good old JFrame. I followed DJ Iceys tut and fixed the error by myself by reading the exceptions it was really quiet simple. Next I added a censor option. Once that was done I added the good old Music player. I wasn't done there quiet yet. I didn't like 317 cache plus I didnt like custom items. Their anoying and really gay. I tried working my way threw to load 377 cache but it just didnt work out. Always got the count down error. I asked galkon about it and he told me to change a line in a class and what do you know? It worked *slaps knee*. Now the max item is 7955 instead of 7620 i beleive? Version 1 was only released on my servers site
[B]Features:[/B] 417 game frame 377 cache JFrame Censor option - deafult off HP above heads. Took forever to get this to work. Music Player Server and Ip switicher 100% working Object, Item, And Npcs list - Thanks to mitb Moving fire cape High detail - some what Money changes colors at 1k 100k 1mill ect..
[B]Downloads:[/B] Client with Cache - [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/153731711/Shamon_Scape_Client._V2.7z]http://rapidshare.com/files/153731711/Shamon_Scape_Client._V2.7z[/url]
Client With out Cache - [url=http://uppit.com/ZG9BR1]http://uppit.com/ZG9BR1[/url] 377 Cache - [url=http://uppit.com/EYAHXD]http://uppit.com/EYAHXD[/url]
[B]Pictures:[/B] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2j0z6hf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/20itl53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/1-2.png[/img] *Removed, contained server IPs.
Credits: MITB Galkon Shamon King aka Openice123 DJ Icey[email][/email]

item.title: Shamon Scape Client v2
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

checkmeup:

[quote]it will get his topic locked and the post deleted… duh?

thats what im talking about…its stupid they need to give people a break…ohhh omg i little advertising in there on an accident they lock the post…to uptight…[/quote]
We simply have to enforce the rules. That is the job of being a moderator. Being a download that ‘already connects’ to an ip already shows to us that it is advertisement. Even though the server is never on, people will adopt this idea and go ‘Ops I didn’t remove the ip. Just remove it when you run it.’, being a smart way to advertise their server when they post a client download.

Read full topic

item.title: Shamon Scape Client v2
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[CENTER]This is my best client I have ever made so far.

The Making:
I start out a long while back with MITB 317 renamed client
I knew little to slim about renamed clients, plus with not alot of tuts out their it pushed me to learn.
I started out with this client by trying to add sprites, which i soon found out how to do.
I can change any sprite on the client I wish.
Next I went for the good old JFrame.
I followed DJ Iceys tut and fixed the error by myself by reading the exceptions it was really quiet simple.
Next I added a censor option.
Once that was done I added the good old Music player.
I wasn’t done there quiet yet. I didn’t like 317 cache plus I didnt like custom items. Their anoying and really gay.
I tried working my way threw to load 377 cache but it just didnt work out. Always got the count down error.
I asked galkon about it and he told me to change a line in a class and what do you know? It worked slaps knee.
Now the max item is 7955 instead of 7620 i beleive?
Version 1 was only released on my servers site

Features:
417 game frame
377 cache
JFrame
Censor option - deafult off
HP above heads. Took forever to get this to work.
Music Player
Server and Ip switicher 100% working
Object, Item, And Npcs list - Thanks to mitb
Moving fire cape
High detail - some what
Money changes colors at 1k 100k 1mill ect…

Downloads:
Client with Cache - http://rapidshare.com/files/153731711/Shamon_Scape_Client._V2.7z

Client With out Cache - http://uppit.com/ZG9BR1
377 Cache - http://uppit.com/EYAHXD

Pictures:

20itl53.png772×562


*Removed, contained server IPs.
